title: Regular season average attendance of the Milwaukee Brewers 2009 to 2019
summary: Overall Average attendance has increased over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Average attendance, about 31589.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Average attendance about 28575.0 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017.
mid_summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.

Minimum Average attendance about 28575.0 was reached at Year 2016
